Direct.name: Direct
Direct.description: The uncertainty has a direct impact on the software system's confidentiality.
Direct.exampleText: Uncertainty related to the input, processing, or storage of sensitive data like user data.

Indirect.name: Indirect
Indirect.description: The uncertainty only has an indirect impact on the software system's confidentiality that usually relies on other uncertainties or other contextual factors.
Indirect.exampleText: Uncertainty related to architectural design decisions, or security measures.

impactNone.name: None
impactNone.description: The uncertainty is expected to have no impact on confidentiality at all.
impactNone.exampleText: Uncertainty related to handling non-sensitive data or within well-secured system parts.
